summary: Phase 4 testing completed successfully. All calendar, task, routine, and dashboard features working correctly with proper integration.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for missing token

passed_tests: Routine CRUD operations for startup and shutdown
Tasks page with month/week/day calendar views
Task creation dialog with recurrence options
Routine task completion toggles on both pages
Dashboard integration showing today's tasks and routines
Dashboard completion toggles for startup/shutdown tasks
Rich text editor with image upload functionality
